quote: How wonderful it must be, to be unable to remember things that once caused us distress. Yet we should embrace all our memories, whether joyful or painful. They're all we ever really own in this life.
quote_letters: HOW WONDERFUL IT MUST BE TO BE UNABLE TO REMEMBER THINGS THAT ONCE CAUSED US DISTRESS YET WE SHOULD EMBRACE ALL OUR MEMORIES WHETHER JOYFUL OR PAINFUL THEYRE ALL WE EVER REALLY OWN IN THIS LIFE
